dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2559 IH: Strengthening Community Care Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Joyce of Pennsylvania (for himself, Ms. Blunt Rochester, Ms. Stefanik, and Mrs. Fletcher) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To extend funding for community health centers and the National Health Service Corps, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strengthening Community Care Act of 2023.

section.header: Extension for community health centers and the National Health Service Corps

subsection.text: Section 10503(b)(1)(F) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 254b–2(b)(1)(F)) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2028.
Section 10503(b)(2)(H) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 254b–2(b)(2)(H)) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2028.
